about_the_game:
The Overpriced DLC contains the following:

  • Prequel short story (33 pages) about Silvanna and Mordina
  • New exclusive pixel art usable as virtual conference background or desktop wallpaper.

Buying the DLC supports the development of new Ignis Universia games!

How to Access the Files

- In Steam, right-click on the game and choose Properties.
- From the Properties, select the Local Files tab.
- Press Browse Local Files...
- You should now see the game's folder with the DLC folder inside it.
- Browse to the DLC folder and find the files.
